name: Christian D'Albano
title: Software Developer | eCommerce & API
summary: Creative Software Developer with 3+ years of experience building highly scalable, web applications, microservices, and contributing to diverse eCommerce platforms. Proficient in designing and implementing UI, RESTful services, and API-driven solutions. Adept at solving complex software systems issues with a focus on reliability, scalability, and performance optimization. Seeking to apply my expertise to next-generation affiliate modern solutions and social commerce experiences.

responsibilities: Contributed to development and integration of highly scalable APIs and web services to support Mouseflow's analytics and eCommerce offerings, ensuring 99.9% uptime and high performance under heavy traffic.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement event-driven interfaces, features and API integrations for key social commerce platforms, enhancing real-time data processing and reducing load times by 40%.
Authored comprehensive technical documentation and knowledge base entries to support user onboarding and reduce support inquiries.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable eCommerce solutions for the patient portal, leveraging RESTful services, Java, and Node.js.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including product and DevOps, to ensure the on-time delivery of critical features.
